feature_model.name: Context Feature Model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Conference_Context(Conference_Context) :o Person(Person) :g (_r_1_4) [1,*] : Location(Location) :g (_r_1_4_5_9) [1,1] : RoomResolution(RoomResolution) : BuildingResolution(BuildingResolution) : EventsPreference(EventsPreference) : Publications(Publications) :g (_r_1_4_7_15) [1,*] : ConferencePapers(ConferencePapers) : JournalPapers(JournalPapers) : BookChapters(BookChapters) : ContactDetails(ContactDetails) :o Conference(Conference) :o Venue(Venue) :o ParticipatingPeople(ParticipatingPeople) :g (_r_2_15_23) [1,*] : PhDStudent(PhDStudent) : Experts(Experts) :g (_r_2_15_23_28_29) [1,1] : HavingAwards(HavingAwards) : HavingJournalPublications(HavingJournalPublications)
